extendedInfo.description: Backup Text for WhatsApp allows you to export your WhatsApp messages, convert to Plain Text, CSV, Excel and HTML file formats and yes, those files can be read in your phone or computer! Your exported files can be saved on your phone's SD card or sent to your email as attachment. It is fast and easy to backup your WhatsApp messages!â Features:* Support Emoji characters in text format and can be displayed in Emoji supported OS (Windows 7, Mac OS X 10.7 or later)* Export your chat messages and Emoji icons can be displayed in the HTML format* Export and send to your email as attachment directly* Filter by chat* Filter by date* Filter by message type* Sorting messages* Export to Normal plain text (*.txt)* Export to CSV, comma-separated values (*.csv)* Export to Excel 2007/2010 workbook (*.xlsx)* Export to HTML conversation (*.html)* Export to HTML table (*.html)* Selectable date and time format* Support Unicode UTF-8 encoding with/without BOM* Support Windows, Unix, Mac plain text new line formatâ Our Facebook page has some Sample Output screenshotsâ¥ Backup Text for WhatsApp and SMS to Text share same file format. Using our app SMS to Text, those export WhatsApp messages can be restored to your phone as SMSâ¥â¥ Tips:Backup Text for WhatsApp export your chat messages, based on your WhatsApp chat history backup. Please follow the steps below, to make the up-to-date chat history backup:1. Open your WhatsApp2. Press the Menu button3. Click "Settings"4. Click "Chat preferences"5. Click "Chat history backup"â¥ If you have any feedback, questions, or concerns, please contact us at:contactus@smeiti.comhttp://www.facebook.com/BackupTextForWhatsAppWhatsApp is a trademark of WhatsApp, Inc.

reviews.title: Poor Backup
reviews.comment: Useless App. What is the point of backing up without having the ability to restore it into the Whatsapp. Whatsapp itself have better backup system. Useless piece of app.
reviews.author: Chua Sen Yan

reviews.title: thank you very much...
reviews.comment: whatsapp suddenly collapse, keep give me msg my phone is not compatible with whatsapp / whatsapp did not support HTC Fire that I using. Without option than install others chat messager recommend by top store and my old contact / chat in whatasapp before did not backup. The new chat messager installed instructed to uninstall whatsapp and follow with everything is cleared (i thought so).   2 days later I found you and setup file for whatsapp which compatible with my phone and I install both.   Thank you. You really make my day..... Everything is back.... photo that friends sent to me, our group chat, some of my company group chating meeting record... all is back...  Awesome~~~~
